entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: The conversation is about the use of "payment address" or "bitcoin address" as opposed to "payment id" or "invoice id". However, there is a problem in associating Bitcoin pubkey-hashes with fixed information like email, physical addresses, or PayPal addresses since the former must be one-use-only. Therefore, the association needs to be broken instead of strengthened.
